name: Abillionveg, Inc
description: Developer of a global review and discovery platform designed to voice an opinion about anything plant-based or cruelty-free. The company's platform leverages technology to help find where to eat, plant-based recipes, perspectives and tips on living well, and also share feedback with business owners to help them shift to more plant-based options, enabling customers to voice their opinions on plant-based alternatives.
one_liner: Developer of a global review and discovery platform designed to voice an opinion about anything plant-based or cruelty-free.
